Package ca.phon.session

Class Tier<T>

java.lang.Object
ca.phon.extensions.ExtendableObject
ca.phon.session.Tier<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
IExtendable, java.lang.Iterable<T>
public final class Tier<T>
extends ExtendableObject
implements java.lang.Iterable<T>
A tier in a record. A tier has a name, type and a number of groups.
